summary: The Illinois Institute of Technology  is a private university in Chicago, Illinois, United States.
full_text: Illinois Institute of Technology, commonly called Illinois Tech or IIT, is a private Ph.D.-granting research university located in Chicago, in the U.S. state of Illinois, with programs in engineering, science, psychology, architecture, business, communications, industrial technology, information technology, design and law. It traces its history to several 19th century engineering and professional education institutions.
title: Illinois Institute of Technology
